hero.name: Luis Molina
hero.description: Enhancing digital experiences that are smooth, scalable, and made to impress.

about.title: About Me
about.description1: Hello, I'm {{name}} passionate about building smart and scalable web & mobile applications. I've completed a full-stack development course and constantly explore new technologies to refine my skills.
about.description2: Focused on continuous learning, I aim to transition into the IT industry by 2027 and eventually move towards AI and data science.

portfolio.title: Portfolio Showcase
portfolio.description: Explore my journey through projects, certifications, and technical expertise. Each section represents a milestone in my continuous learning path.

iarecruitment.title: AI Recruitment App
iarecruitment.description: AI-powered recruitment platform built with Express.js and Next.js for intelligent candidate analysis and recommendations.

baccbeauty.title: BaccBeauty
baccbeauty.description: Professional beauty salon website built with WordPress and Elementor, showcasing services and portfolio.

coorslightpty.title: Coors Light Paraguay
coorslightpty.description: Brand website for Coors Light in Paraguay, developed using Drupal with modern design.

minestle.title: Mi Nestlé
minestle.description: Website development in Drupal. Section of articles and downloadable materials with filter by countries, brands section, recipes, promotions, podcast section by seasons and episodes.

nescafe.title: Nescafé - Guatemala
nescafe.description: Brand website for Nescafé developed with PHP, featuring modern design and product showcase.

nestleagusta.title: Nestlé Anchor
nestleagusta.description: Section of the Nestlé brand website created using PHP, promoting healthy living and products.

crystodolar.title: CrystoDólar
crystodolar.description: Real-time currency exchange rate tracker for Venezuelan Bolívar against USD. Features API built with Python and FastAPI that performs web scraping from various exchange houses and P2P Binance USDT market, calculating individual averages for buy/sell prices.

contact.title: Contact Me
contact.subtitle: Got a question? Send me a message, and I'll get back to you soon.
contact.formDescription: Have something to discuss? Send me a message and let's talk.
contact.subject: Subject
